entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 23.0.knots20220529 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots version 23.0.knots20220529 has been released with new features, bug fixes, performance improvements, and updated translations. The release notes and change log can be found on GitHub. Bugs can be reported using the issue tracker also available on GitHub. To receive security and update notifications, users can subscribe to the announcements mailing list on the Bitcoin Knots website. The new version is now available for download from the official website.
